# nirvana_project (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "nirvana_project" "example_project" {
  name = "My Project"
  tags = ["production", "ethereum"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Project name.

### Optional

- `tags` (List of String) Tags to attach to the Project.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) When the Project was created.
- `id` (String) Project ID.
- `updated_at` (String) When the Project was updated.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
$ terraform import nirvana_project.example '<project_id>'
```
